淡.definition: insipid; diluted; weak; mild; light in color; tasteless; indifferent; (variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen

淡出.definition: to fade out (cinema); to withdraw from (politics, acting etc); to fade from (memory)

淡化.definition: to water down; to play down; to trivialize; to weaken; to become dull with time; to desalinate; desalination

淡喉鷯鶥.definition: (bird species of China) pale-throated wren-babbler (Spelaeornis kinneari)

淡季.definition: off season; slow business season; see also 旺季[wang4 ji4]

淡尾鶲鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Alström's warbler (Phylloscopus soror)

淡忘.definition: to gradually forget as time passes; to have (sth) fade from one's memory

淡水.definition: potable water (water with low salt content); fresh water

淡水區.definition: Tamsui or Danshui District, New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

淡泊名利.definition: not caring about fame and fortune (idiom); indifferent to worldly rewards

淡泊明志.definition: living a simple life as one's ideal (idiom)

淡淡.definition: faint; dim; dull; insipid; unenthusiastic; indifferent

淡灰眉岩鵐.definition: (bird species of China) rock bunting (Emberiza cia)

淡眉柳鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Hume's leaf warbler (Phylloscopus humei)

淡紫鳾.definition: (bird species of China) yellow-billed nuthatch (Sitta solangiae)

淡綠鵙鶥.definition: (bird species of China) green shrike-babbler (Pteruthius xanthochlorus)

淡腳樹鶯.definition: (bird species of China) pale-footed bush warbler (Hemitesia pallidipes)

淡腹點翅朱雀.pinyin: dan4 fu4 dian3 chi4 zhu1 que4
淡腹點翅朱雀.definition: (bird species of China) Sharpe's rosefinch (Carpodacus verreauxii)

淡色崖沙燕.definition: (bird species of China) pale martin (Riparia diluta)

淡頦仙鶲.definition: (bird species of China) pale-chinned flycatcher (Cyornis poliogenys)

淡黃腰柳鶯.definition: (bird species of China) lemon-rumped warbler (Phylloscopus chloronotus)
